questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Construction site
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) On a construction site
D) Inside a museum

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) Road construction
D) A family gathering

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) The trees
B) The construction equipment
C) The people
D) The buildings

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A dirt and debris
C) A person
D) A building

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A city skyline
B) Trees and a house/pavilion
C) The ocean
D) A mountain range

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Flowers
B) Construction debris and dirt
C) A picnic table
D) A playground

What type of vehicle is shown in the photo?
A) A car
B) A bicycle
C) A construction grader
D) A motorcycle

What color is the construction equipment?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Yellow
D) Green

What is the purpose of the orange fencing in the photo?
A) To keep animals out
B) To mark the construction area
C) To provide shade
D) To decorate the site

What indicates that this is a construction site?
A) The presence of construction equipment and debris
B) The presence of people in hard hats
C) The presence of a picnic table
D) The presence of a playground

What can be seen behind the orange fencing?
A) A lake
B) A road and trees
C) A mountain
D) A playground

What is the condition of the ground in the photo?
A) Covered in grass
B) Covered in snow
C) Dirt and debris
D) Paved with concrete

What type of building is partially visible in the background?
A) A skyscraper
B) A house or pavilion
C) A factory
D) A school

What is the primary activity taking place in the photo?
A) Gardening
B) Construction work
C) Playing sports
D) Having a picnic

What is the state of the road in the photo?
A) Smooth and paved
B) Under construction and partially dug up
C) Covered in snow
D) Covered in leaves

What kind of trees are visible in the background?
A) Palm trees
B) Evergreen trees
C) Deciduous trees
D) Fruit trees

What is the main color of the debris on the ground?
A) Red
B) Brown - Beige
C) Black and gray
D) Green

What is the position of the construction vehicle in relation to the orange fencing?
A) Behind the fencing
B) In front of the fencing
C) On top of the fencing
D) Under the fencing

What is the texture of the ground in the photo?
A) Smooth and even
B) Rough and uneven
C) Wet and muddy
D) Covered in leaves

What is the main color of the construction vehicle?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Yellow
D) Green

What is the orientation of the trees in the background?
A) They are leaning to the left
B) They are leaning to the right
C) They are standing straight
D) They are bent over

What type of surface is the construction vehicle operating on?
A) Grass
B) Dirt and debris
C) Concrete
D) Water

What is the condition of the sky in the photo?
A) Overcast
B) Clear and blue
C) Stormy
D) Foggy

What is the primary color of the construction debris?
A) Red
B) Brown/ Beige
C) Black and gray
D) White

What is the construction vehicle doing?
A) Transporting materials
B) Grading the ground
C) Digging a hole
D) Planting trees

What is the condition of the road in the background?
A) Newly paved
B) Under construction
C) Covered in snow
D) Covered in leaves

What is the main activity depicted in the photo?
A) A sports event
B) A family picnic
C) Road construction
D) A festival

What is the state of the trees in the background?
A) Leafless
B) Full of leaves
C) Covered in snow
D) Burnt

What is the primary material of the construction vehicle?
A) Plastic
B) Metal
C) Wood
D) Fabric

What is the predominant color of the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green-beige
C) Yellow
D) Red

What is the condition of the construction vehicle?
A) New and shiny
B) Old and rusty
C) Moderately used
D) Broken down

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The construction vehicle, construction work and trees
B) The trees
C) The sky
D) The buildings

What is the visual contrast in the photo?
A) Between the green trees and the yellow construction vehicle
B) Between the blue sky and the red fencing
C) Between the black debris and the white clouds
D) Between the brown dirt and the green grass

What is the primary challenge depicted in the photo?
A) Navigating through the debris
B) Finding a place to sit
C) Playing sports
D) Enjoying a picnic

What is the overall theme of the photo?
A) Nature and tranquility
B) Construction and development
C) Sports and recreation
D) Family and togetherness

What is the state of the ground in the photo?
A) Paved and clean
B) Covered with grass
C) Dug up and filled with rubble
D) Covered with snow
